entry.title: srinjoyray/quadtree-geo: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript library for geographic coordinate encoding using quadtree. This implementation provides methods for encoding/decoding coordinates, finding neighbors, calculating bounding boxes, and performing proximity-based searches.
entry.content: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript library for geographic coordinate encoding using quadtree. This implementation provides methods for encoding/decoding coordinates, finding neighbors, calculating bounding boxes, and performing proximity-based searches.

entry.title: shokuninstudio/Ollama-Ultralight: Ollama Ultralight is a private ultra lightweight frontend for Ollama and designed to stay under 20 kilobytes on disk.

entry.title: actioncrew/streamix: Streamix is a lightweight reactive programming library for JavaScript and TypeScript, offering RxJS-like functionality through generator-based streams for efficient async data processing.
entry.content: Streamix is a lightweight reactive programming library for JavaScript and TypeScript, offering RxJS-like functionality through generator-based streams for efficient async data processing.

entry.title: sahil-pardhi/textutils: TextUtils is a simple text manipulation tool that lets users convert text to uppercase, lowercase, remove extra spaces, and copy text easily. With a user-friendly interface, it ensures a smooth experience for quick text formatting. Lightweight and fast, TextUtils is a handy tool for students, writers, and professionals.
entry.content: TextUtils is a simple text manipulation tool that lets users convert text to uppercase, lowercase, remove extra spaces, and copy text easily. With a user-friendly interface, it ensures a smooth experience for quick text formatting. Lightweight and fast, TextUtils is a handy tool for students, writers, and professionals.

entry.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for a CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. entry.title: tibetty/osm2geojson-lite: a lightweight yet faster osm (either in xml or in json formats) to geojson convertor - 4x faster than xmldom + osmtogeojson in most situations - implemented in pure JavaScript without any 3rd party dependency

entry.title: ignis621/PomoJS: PomoJS is a simple pomodoro timer written in JavaScript. It is designed to be as minimal as possible, while still being functional. It's also designed to be as lightweight as possible, so it can be used on any device.

entry.title: marco0antonio0/DirrochaCMS: DirrochaCMS is a lightweight CMS for content management with an API for websites and apps. It supports easy editing, publishing, and deployment on Netlify and Vercel, using Firebase Firestore as a free NoSQL database.
entry.content: DirrochaCMS is a lightweight CMS for content management with an API for websites and apps. It supports easy editing, publishing, and deployment on Netlify and Vercel, using Firebase Firestore as a free NoSQL database.
